reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan soft, comfortable, and warm, with high-end quality and excellent value for money. They appreciate its style, with one customer noting it can be dressed up or down. The fit receives mixed feedback, with one customer describing it as slightly oversized.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater!
items.body: This is such a pretty sweater! It is not quite as oversized as the photos, but it is roomy and fits true to size. The fabric is so soft and warm and the construction is high quality. It comes vacuum packed so you have to wait for the fuzz to fluff up. I ordered it in white to wear as a bed jacket, but i will wear it out of bed, too. I might even order another color. Good value for a versitile sweater. Read more
items.author: Aleta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Style and weight
items.body: So soft and perfect, the fit was great , itâ€™s warm and comfortable. I easily styled it over a dress to keep me warm at a formal wedding in San Francisco. Read more
items.author: Monique Chenault

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars To oversized enough.
items.body: I was disappointed in how small it was in person. I bought this thinking based on the pics and size chart, this would be a slouchy and oversized fuzzy sweater. For reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™8 and typically wear a large. Based on the size chart, it looked like it shouldâ€™ve been nicely oversized. It was not. It was slightly oversized. Even if Iâ€™d gone up a size, it wouldnâ€™t have been slouchy enough. The fuzziness was great though. If youâ€™re a med, sm, or xs, size up a size or 2, and itâ€™ll be perfect. Read more
items.author: EJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun sweater
items.body: Bigger than expected. Bought M but could have gotten small. I sized up for larger fit but did not need to do. Very fluffy and comfortable. Dress up or dress down. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Is a Treasure Find!
items.body: These sweaters are fabulous! Iâ€™m a sweater snob and this has passed all tests. Itâ€™s yummy soft, has a great shape, and the white it pure white! I also ordered the mushroom color, love, and will be purchasing the black next. Someone said the buttons look cheap, but they match the buttons on my Free People cardiganâ€¦ soâ€¦Iâ€™m 5â€™4 #124 and ordered an XL for an oversized fit and itâ€™s very flattering. This is a find ðŸ©· Read more
items.author: Theresa Anderson

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars More like a rug
items.body: Very staticy and heavy. Felt like I was wearing a bath mat. I was really excited about this one to. Total disappointment. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars fit, quality, color, style.
items.body: Runs 2x sizes larger; I ordered a Medium, 5'3", 135lbs,medium build. Arm length is 2 inches longer than at wrist. Falls past my bottom, hangs nicely. I can use Wide Band Belt to formalize, and hang loose with comfy tights and it's a short tunic. I'd probably get a Small or extra small. Good quality for price, very comfy, a go-to sweater. Read more
items.author: Dolores W

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this sweater!
items.body: Soft, warm, cozy, and cute. I love this sweater. I had previously gotten the black one and loved it. Ran the black one through the wash, and still looks great! (haven't washed the pink one yet) Read more
items.author: J. Finn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Yellow, Deep Sea Green, Apricot, Black, Grey, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
